MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: DOSPRN, DOS print, prn2file, print, printing, DOS USB, dosprint, printfil, dos program, usb printer, print server, pdf printer, fax printer
English.Char_Desc_45: Print to windows printer from a dos program
English.Char_Desc_80: DOSPRN allows to use your old DOS program with new printers
English.Char_Desc_250: DOSPRN allows to print reports from your favorite DOS program on the modern printers independently of their types. USB, PDF, network printers supported.
English.Char_Desc_450:
DOSPRN is a special program for support printing from DOS applications on any kinds of printers include winprinters, USB-printers, network printers, print servers etc.
Also DOSPRN supports Epson and HP PCL Esc-sequences emulation, multiple international codepages, landscape/portrait printing, text color manipulation, absolute positioning and many other features.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
This program helps to extend life to old DOS programs. Nowadays, many laser and jet printers have powerful features but ... can not print a simple text accurately. Besides, some inexpensive printers can not print in text mode at all (the so-called win-printers or GDI-devices).
DOSPRN allows you to use a good old DOS program with new printers irrespective of their types (Yes, USB and network printers, print-servers, and PDF-printers too!)
Also DOSPRN supports Epson and HP PCL Esc-sequences emulation, multiple international codepages, landscape/portrait printing, text color manipulation, absolute positioning and many other features.
